description.@en: The only way to get what you want is by force—anything else is just lip service.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you and your allies face foes 6:1, both you and a number of allies equal to [FB] add 2D6 Fury Die to Total Damage, instead of the normal 1D6.
